attributes.action: produce new guidelines on vitamin D supplementation for pregnant women and children and run a high profile public awareness campaign to ensure that people know what level of vitamin D they should be taking. Scotland has the highest rates of MS in the world. A lack of vitamin D has not only been linked with MS but several other chronic diseases.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Please sign the petition and to find out more information log on to:

www.shineonscotland.org.uk
